item.description:
Join fellow Members and Guests of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group for a fun Friday Night Dinner @ Firefly's BBQ in Quincy! Come on out for some BBQ, relaxation, and fun times as we start our Labor Day weekend! Firefly's has a wide variety of food to choose from, even if you are not a BBQ fan. There's a lot of food options for sharing. Firefly's has been mentioned among the Org Team a few times and this is the perfect opportunity for us to try this restaurant for the first time as a group.

Price Ranges are as follows.
Apps: $5-$20
Salads: $5-$16
Entrees: $12-$20
Sandwiches: $6-$10
Sides: $2.99/ea or 3 for $8
Dessert: $2.50-$6.49

This will be a great opportunity to meet and get to know each other, as well as talk about different foods, restaurants, and meals we enjoy. This will also be a great time to plan future Dining Out events.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the meal, including but not limited to, your drinks, food, tax, and tip and any shared items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Friday Night Dinner
Firefly's BBQ
516 Adams Street
Quincy, MA 02169
617-471-0011
http://www.fireflysbb...

Meeting Location: Outside the front door if it's nice out. We will then go in together as a Group. Otherwise, inside the Lobby. If you arrive after we are seated the reservation is under "Angela."

Organizer(s): Angela

Min/Max: Min of 6 people 48 hours in advance. No maximum right now.

Guests: 1 per Member

Event Fees: Annual Members and one Guest- FREE, Group Members - $2, Guests - $2

RSVP Deadline: 7pm on Thursday, September 2nd. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer and will be considered a No-Show per our guidelines on the About Us page. (It's OK if you are a couple minutes late given that it's Labor Day weekend and traffic is a little crazy.)

Inclement Weather: This event will take place rain or shine, hurricane or tropical storm (unless the authorities tell us otherwise).

Please Note: Annual Members are allowed to bring ONE GUEST FREE to this event.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Courtesy of Firefly's website.

Take Route 93 to the Southeast Expressway. Take Exit 8, Furnace Brook Parkway, and follow to the Adams Street intersection, about 2 miles, and turn left. Firefly's is almost immediately on your left.

(If you pass the Villa Rosa you have gone too far.)

Parking: In lot next to and behind restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the Front Door. Late arrivals should ask the host for "Angela."

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Friday Night Dinner
